### Pterodactyl

_Long-beaked beasts with wide, triangular wings. Large enough to carry off a human._

**LV** 4, **AL** N
**AC** 14, **HP** 20, **MV** double near (fly)
**ATK** 2 beak +4 (1d8 + grab)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| 2 | 4 | 2 | -2 | 1 | -3 |

**Grab:** DC 15 STR or held. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.
